PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 42 Bromination of 4a , b with Br 2 gave rise to the monomers 5a,b.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| ------------- |
| 42 (compound) |
| 4a (compound) |
| 4b (compound) |
| Br 2 (reagent) |
| monomers (compounds) |
| 5a (compound) |
| 5b (compound) |

Note: In this context, "gave rise to" implies a chemical reaction, and the resulting compounds (monomers 5a,b) are the material properties produced from the reaction of 4a,b with Br2.

| Br 2 |

[Explanation: In the original paragraph, "42" and "Br 2" can be considered as the quantities or amounts of reactants used in the reaction, and "monomers 5a,b" are the products of the reaction. These entities can be considered as material properties or values.]
